title: Foley In Flux 01
description: “Foley In Flux 01” include, Clock, Apron, Metal, Rubber, Glass, Typing On Keyboard sounds. This pack consists of 150 sounds and cues and recorded  and mixing at 24 Bit 96 kHz.
longDescription:
Every sounds have their own moment and the moment giving us flux and feelings. In this perfective, we bring you an extraordinary collection of lovingly recorded foley props, designed to add unparalleled depth and realism to your projects. The Collection name is “Foley In Flux”. In This Series you can find several props in progress. 


“Foley In Flux 01” include, Clock, Apron, Metal, Rubber, Glass, Typing On Keyboard sounds. This pack consists of 150 sounds and cues and recorded and mixing at 24 Bit 96 kHz.


Empowering you to bring your gaming worlds to life with immersive and transparent details. Let’s get create your audio experience with "Foley In Flux 01" and let every action, movement, and interaction resonate with realism and immersion. 


"Notes: We would like to dedicate each package of the Foley In Flux series to musicians and sound designers who are no longer with us, whom we met either theoretically or personally in the flux. "


We salute Peter Brötzmann in the first package of the series!


Let’s Get Create The Future Love N Imagination
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 150

Number of Audio Cues: 150

Sample rate / bit rate: 96 kHz / 24 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 00:03:31

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
